domain.name: golfstar.com.au
domain.description: GolfStar - Last Minute Golf deals up to 50% off. Book discounted tee times within 48 hours at top Australian golf courses.

seo.title: GolfStar - Last Minute Golf Deals | 50% Off Tee Times Australia
seo.description: Book last-minute tee times up to 50% off at premium Australian golf courses. Dynamic pricing fills empty slots - golfers save, courses profit.

content.title: Last Minute Golf - Up to 50% Off Tee Times
content.subtitle: Book premium golf courses within 48 hours and save big. Dynamic pricing fills empty slots while golfers get incredible deals.

content.title: The Smart Way to Play Golf

features.title: Instant Savings
features.description: Save 20-50% on premium courses by booking within 48 hours. Our dynamic pricing benefits golfers and golf courses alike

features.title: Mobile-First Booking
features.description: Book your tee time in under 30 seconds. GPS location shows nearest courses with immediate availability

features.title: Premium Courses
features.description: Access top-rated courses across Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane and Perth. Play where you've always wanted to play

emailCapture.headline: Get Golf Deal Alerts
emailCapture.description: Join 4,200+ golfers getting exclusive last-minute deals at premium courses. Never pay full price again.
emailCapture.successMessage: Perfect! We'll send you the best last-minute golf deals in your area within 24 hours.
